Html:
Hello,

 

I am very new to Oxite and wonder if there is a way to integrate it into my existing MVC application i.e to have one single oxite-blog page and my other hundred ones left alone.

Is that possible ?
I heard there is the conecpt of "areas". can someone tell me more about that?
I too would like to integrate Oxite into my existing MVC app. Ideally as a subdomain, i.e. blog. domain.com; is doable?

I dont think so. I just did a cms by myself.
